title: 3 and Out - Raiders/Chargers MNF Reaction, Defending Urban, Buying the 'Boys, Rodgers Rolling, Week 4 Takes, Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Raiders/Chargers MNF Reaction, Defending Urban, Buying the 'Boys, Rodgers Rolling, Week 4 Takes, Mailbag
description:
John reacts to the Chargers MNF win over the Raiders, and why history will not look kindly upon teams that passed on Justin Herbert. He also explains why he's not ready to crush Urban Meyer over the viral lap dance video that broke over the weekend, why Aaron Rodgers is back to looking like an MVP after a disastrous week 1, why he also gives his Week 4 takeaways - including giving Kliff Kingsbury for a big win over the Rams - and answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag.

Make sure you follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
